scripts.clean:build: if [ -d build ]; then rm -rf build; fi
scripts.start: npm run clean:build; mkdir -p build; npm run cp:dev; npm run watch & live-server --no-browser --wait=400 build
scripts.css: postcss -p sugarss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers "last 3 versions" -u postcss-flexbugs-fixes -u postcss-partial-import -u postcss-nested -u css-mqpacker -o build/index.css src/index.sss
scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development npm run watch:pug & npm run watch:css
scripts.build:css: npm run css; cssnano build/index.css build/index.css
scripts.build:src: npm run pug && npm run build:css && npm run build:image
scripts.build: npm run clean:build; mkdir -p build; npm run build:src; npm run favicon; npm run cname; npm run keybase
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run ghpages
